code:
```verilog
[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic [3:0] in,       // 4-bit input vector representing a, b, c, d
    output logic out_sop,       // Output for minimum sum-of-products form
    output logic out_pos        // Output for minimum product-of-sums form
);

always @(*) begin
    out_sop = (~in[3] & ~in[2] & in[1] & ~in[0]) ||  // 2 (0010)
               (~in[3] & in[2] & in[1] & in[0])  ||  // 7 (0111)
               (in[3] & in[2] & in[1] & in[0]);     // 15 (1111)

    out_pos = (~in[3] | ~in[2] | ~in[1]) &&  // 0, 1
               (~in[3] | ~in[2] | in[0]) &&  // 4, 5
               (~in[3] | in[2] | ~in[1]) &&  // 6
               (in[3] | ~in[2] | ~in[0]) &&  // 9
               (in[3] | ~in[2] | in[1]) &&   // 10
               (in[3] | in[2] | ~in[1]) &&   // 13
               (in[3] | in[2] | in[0]);       // 14
end

endmodule
[DONE]
```

module TopModule (
    input wire [3:0] in,       // 4-bit input vector representing a, b, c, d
    output wire out_sop,       // Output for minimum sum-of-products form
    output wire out_pos        // Output for minimum product-of-sums form
);

assign out_sop = (~in[3] & ~in[2] & in[1] & ~in[0]) |  // 2 (0010)
                 (~in[3] & in[2] & in[1] & in[0])  |  // 7 (0111)
                 (in[3] & in[2] & in[1] & in[0]);     // 15 (1111)

assign out_pos = (~in[3] | ~in[2] | ~in[1]) &  // 0, 1
                 (~in[3] | ~in[2] | in[0]) &   // 4, 5
                 (~in[3] | in[2] | ~in[1]) &   // 6
                 (in[3] | ~in[2] | ~in[1] | in[0]) &  // 9
                 (in[3] | ~in[2] | in[1] | ~in[0]) &  // 10
                 (in[3] | in[2] | ~in[1] | ~in[0]) &  // 13
                 (in[3] | in[2] | in[1] | ~in[0]);    // 14

endmodule

iterations.code:
[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic [3:0] in,       // 4-bit input vector representing a, b, c, d
    output logic out_sop,       // Output for minimum sum-of-products form
    output logic out_pos        // Output for minimum product-of-sums form
);

always @(*) begin
    out_sop = (in == 4'b0010) || (in == 4'b0111) || (in == 4'b1111);
    
    out_pos = (~(in == 4'b0000) && ~(in == 4'b0001) && ~(in == 4'b0100) &&
               ~(in == 4'b0101) && ~(in == 4'b0110) && ~(in == 4'b1001) &&
               ~(in == 4'b1010) && ~(in == 4'b1101) && ~(in == 4'b1110));
end

endmodule
[DONE]
